comments:
[I20051101-0010]

Steps:

Open the error log view.
Create a breakpoint and choose "Breakpoint Properties..." from the context menu.
Click "Enable Condition".
Enter "Thread.d", wait for the code assist pop-up, and hit enter.
Everything works as expected, but an entry is written to the error log, with the
following stack trace:

will be fixed for M4
